text: Juan Carlos Tedesco (February 5, 1944 - May 8, 2017) was an Argentine academic and policy maker. He served as the Education Minister from December 2007 to July 2009 during the Cristina Fernández de Kirchner presidency. He was born in Buenos Aires. Tedesco died on May 8, 2017 in Buenos Aires at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * Currículum Vitae * Políticas de subjetividad para la igualdad de oportunidades educativas Category:1944 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires
title: Juan Carlos Tedesco
